title: 话说你们有没有遇见过这种情况。
author: angelo
txt_content:
我昨天上了上MCBBS，发现了这个问题。
  请位大大看看：

 504 Gateway Time-out The gateway did not receive a timely response from the upstream server or application. Sorry for the inconvenience.
 Please report this message and include the following information to us.
 Thank you very much!URL:http://www.mcbbs.net/Server:cn-hlj-cu6Date:2014/07/01 19:49:53 Powered by Tengine

 
  是什么回事。。。

replies.author: angelo
replies.txt_content:
Aikawastep 发表于 2014-7-1 19:56
淡定。。我是404  404了2个月...
话说是这么回事,经常连不了论坛
